wiki.text:
with labels]] s with a label]] ]] s on a car.]] with labels]]

A 'label' is a piece of paper, polymer, cloth, metal, or other material affixed
to a container or article, on which is printed a legend, information concerning
the product, addresses, etc. A label may also be printed directly on the
container or article.

Labels have many uses: product identification, name tags, advertising, warnings,
and other communication. Special types of labels called digital labels (printed
through a digital printing) can also have special constructions such as RFID
tags, security printing, and sandwich process labels.
wiki.title: label
